channel.title: なくなった - Lex (experimental)
channel.description:
https://soundcloud.com/lextunes/zeneko-2
Apologies for not sharing anything lately; a lot has been going on in my life and I just... can’t make music anymore. I don’t have the motivation. So here’s a reworking of an [old track](https://lextunes.bandcamp.com/track/gradually-healing) because I can’t come up with anything new.
Let me know what you guys think ^^
